verses.name: 1 Samuel 31:4
verses.text: Then said Saul unto his armourbearer, Draw thy sword, and thrust me through therewith; lest these uncircumcised come and thrust me through, and abuse me. But his armourbearer would not; for he was sore afraid. Therefore Saul took a sword, and fell upon it.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 31:5
verses.text: And when his armourbearer saw that Saul was dead, he fell likewise upon his sword, and died with him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 31:6
verses.text: So Saul died, and his three sons, and his armourbearer, and all his men, that same day together.
